text:
="preserve">Erich Gruenberg (12 October 1924 – 7 August 2020) was an Austrian-born British violinist and teacher. He was a principal violinist of major orchestras in Stockholm and London. He taught at the Royal Academy of Music. He was born in Vienna.
Gruenberg died on 7 August 2020 at the Hampstead Garden Suburb in London at age 95.
